name: Mission Out Of Control
description:
Welcome to Mission Out Of Control. The wacky asynchronous multiplayer party game where one of you will be the pilot of an out of control spaceship while your friends will take on the role of mission control.

As the pilot, the ship's computer will inform what needs to be fixed but you have no idea how to do what the ship is asking.

As mission control, you will have to tell the ship’s pilot the proper instructions on how to fix the ship. All the instructions to save the ship are in the provided manual. But be warned, the manuals are old and have mistakes in them, though someone has helpfully written down the corrections.

Can everyone work together through the chaos to bring the ship in for a safe landing before time is up?
